mapper.select: select cash_num, regDate, cashAmount, specification, userId, cashKind from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(dk_cash pk_cash) */ rownum rn, cash_num, regDate, cashAmount, specification, userId, cashKind from dk_cash where (specification = '승인중' or specification = '승인완료') and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.update: update dk_cash set specification = '승인완료' where cash_num = #{cash_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from dk_cash where specification = '승인중' or specification = '승인완료'
mapper.update: update dk_member set cash = cash + #{cashAmount} where userId = #{userId}
update dk_member set cash = cash - #{cashAmount} where userId = #{userId}
